solution_line_template: When Katherine is {num_dozen_katherine_age} dozen years old, she will be {num_dozen_katherine_age}*{dozen}=<<{num_dozen_katherine_age}*{dozen}={katherine_age_in_years}>>{katherine_age_in_years} years old.

If Mel is three years younger than Katherine, then when Katherine is {katherine_age_in_years} years old, Mel will be {katherine_age_in_years}-{mel_younger_by}=<<{katherine_age_in_years}-{mel_younger_by}={mel_age}>>{mel_age} years old.
